item.title: Covid-19: Enduring Images of a Global Crisis, 5 Years On
item.description: New York Times photographers covered Covid-19 throughout the world. These pictures, and the moments behind them, stayed with them.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Canada’s Election
item.description: Mark Carney, a former central banker, now heads the Liberal Party and will soon lead Canada, tasked with responding to President Trump’s threats.

item.title: Trump Looms Over Greenland’s Election, but Voters Have Other Concerns
item.description: President Trump keeps saying he wants to “get” Greenland. On Tuesday, Greenland votes for a new parliament that could shape its future relations with ...

item.title: His Bollywood Spoofs Brought Joy to a Mill Town. Then Bollywood Came Calling.
item.description: An Indian biopic tells the story of Nasir Shaikh, whose no-budget, all-heart productions gave his home city of Malegaon a film industry of its own.

item.title: Syrians Demand Better Protection Amid a Spate of Kidnappings
